data.what_is:
Jumplead is a web-based marketing automation solution that assists marketers in email marketing, creating landing pages, contact management and lead management. This solution is suited for small and midsize businesses (SMBs).

Jumplead's Contact Management feature enables marketers to segment, nurture and score leads based on real-time lead activity on the website. In addition, the platform allows marketing executives to create conversion forms to drive lead generation by sending automated emails and notifications for following up.

Jumplead's Email Marketing feature enables organizations to run customized email campaigns to nurture leads. This feature also allows marketers to track email open rates, bounce rates and unsubscribe rates.

The Campaign Reporting feature summarizes email campaign performance by tracking lead activities connected to email campaigns.

Jumplead's Live Chat feature lets users chat with website visitors and answer their queries.
data.product_description: Jumplead is an inbound and marketing automation service designed to help turn visitors into customers.

pricing_plans.plan_description:
Our range of Enterprise plans offer everything you need to run marketing automation at scale.

Get in touch with us for more details.

alternatives.name: Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Jumplead?
Jumplead has optimised our marketing strategies, simplifying processes and improve lead management effectively. It's versatile suite of tools, from email marketing to lead management, empowerment SMBs to execute target campaigns efficiently.

What do you dislike about Jumplead?
While Jumplead offer robust features, its integration option with other platforms are somewhat restricted, potentially impacting seamless workflow integration.

What problems is Jumplead solving and how is that benefiting you?
Jumplead streamlines marketing process, improving lead management efficiency, enhancing customer engagement and provide valuable insights to help users maximize their marketing ROI

What do you dislike about Jumplead?

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Jumplead?
This is most effective marketing automation tool for inbound sales activities.
It provides feature of uniformity in pricing and also act as platform of B2B marketing automation.
It is definitely better than competitors.

What do you dislike about Jumplead?
There is no such feature where I could dislike or provide remarks of non-functionality.
No area of improvement applicable to the best of my knowledge as it is holistic tool serving inbound sales requirements.

What problems is Jumplead solving and how is that benefiting you?
Problem solving happened for online marketing activities that could be executed with efficiency and accuracy.
It also solved problems of integrating email level marketing & contact analytical.
It is definitely beneficial to me and added my productivity for sure.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great Tool For Automation of Small enterprises
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Jumplead?
It helps in making business management easier by automation of emails and management of data of our clients, the leads generation it provides is decent. As far as my experience with the software, everything works pretty well.

What do you dislike about Jumplead?
There is nothing I dislike about the software. However, my colleagues have told me that the customer support service of the software is terrible so that issue should be fixed if it hasn't been fixed until now.

Recommendations to others considering Jumplead:
Go for it if your business needs some automation.

What problems is Jumplead solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are automating the generation of leads to our company and managing email campaigns with clients with the help of the software.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Jumplead?
review_question_answers.answer: It helps in making business management easier by automation of emails and management of data of our clients, the leads generation it provides is decent. As far as my experience with the software, everything works pretty well.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Jumplead?
review_question_answers.answer: There is nothing I dislike about the software. However, my colleagues have told me that the customer support service of the software is terrible so that issue should be fixed if it hasn't been fixed until now.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Jumplead:
review_question_answers.answer: Go for it if your business needs some automation.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Jumplead solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: We are automating the generation of leads to our company and managing email campaigns with clients with the help of the software.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Jumplead?
i like that i easily combine marketing landing pages, integrated forms, lead management with scoring, and activity alerts, i combine forms with lead pages, i automate email marketing and live chat with my team, Jumplead imposes marketing and sales for my company


What do you dislike about Jumplead?
Is a good platform for small and medium enterprises that want to make their sales, advertising and marketing profitable, with an easy to use interface.

Recommendations to others considering Jumplead:
I recommend Jumplead as it manages, segments and scores your contacts, automatically tracks activities such as web visits, chat sessions, email interaction and form completion, Combining website analysis, email marketing and a contact management system, Jumplead identifies, converts and manages your potential customers.

What problems is Jumplead solving and how is that benefiting you?
I customized marketing campaigns with this platform for my company, I sent specific campaigns to my personalized contact segments and moved potential customers through my sales funnel, I made automatic response campaigns of multiple steps over time to nourish and re-involve my potential customers, Activate my campaigns with automation to respond to the behavior of my contact, such as completing a conversion form or visiting a certain website.

initial_reviews.review_title: A great tool to monitor which corporates are interested in you
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Jumplead helped with:
I used Jumplead for website traffic tracking & some marketing automation when I worked at Epiphan Video, so when we website conversion challenges at Bunch I decided to try Jumplead for the same purpose.

What do you like best about Jumplead?
Jumplead is great in showing you which corporate customers visited your website, it would sometimes show exact people who rolled around the website and would connect this with Google Analytics data to show which pages they visited and how long they stayed for, where they converted (if converted) etc. This gives one a card blanche to go after these folks - I would connect with them on LinkedIn, reach out with the message and close them for a call. Having insights on the pages they visited I'd be able to say what they are majorly interested in - which of the problems Bunch solves are the most acute ones (e.g. measuring culture/hiring/improving teamwork).

What do you dislike about Jumplead?
There are several things that Jumplead doesn't seem to work well for:

- Monitoring traffic from SMEs and startups - it can only show who visited for bigger corporates, but it can't do so for smaller companies and startups (key audience for Bunch)
- Jumplead has some of Intercom's features - e.g. website chat and follow-up functionality, however they are not as robust and as well-designed as Intercom's (that's why we use Intercom for this stuff)

Recommendations to others considering Jumplead:
If you are working with corporates and want to get a better use of your website traffic, better capture leads and supply your sales guys with some more warm leads - Jumplead will be of great help. It would also work well if you are looking for a relatively low-cost marketing automation solution. If you want a high-end setup with better design, more functionality etc. - then you are better off combining other tools. I wouldn't say Jumplead works well for companies targeting SMEs - a lot of value is lost as it just doesn't recognize those leads.

review_question_answers.question: Describe the project or task Jumplead helped with:
review_question_answers.answer: I used Jumplead for website traffic tracking & some marketing automation when I worked at Epiphan Video, so when we website conversion challenges at Bunch I decided to try Jumplead for the same purpose.

- Jumplead has some of Intercom's features - e.g. website chat and follow-up functionality, however they are not as robust and as well-designed as Intercom's (that's why we use Intercom for this stuff)

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Jumplead:
review_question_answers.answer: If you are working with corporates and want to get a better use of your website traffic, better capture leads and supply your sales guys with some more warm leads - Jumplead will be of great help. It would also work well if you are looking for a relatively low-cost marketing automation solution. If you want a high-end setup with better design, more functionality etc. - then you are better off combining other tools. I wouldn't say Jumplead works well for companies targeting SMEs - a lot of value is lost as it just doesn't recognize those leads.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great value for a basic marketing automation platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Jumplead helped with:
Implementing low-cost marketing automation

What do you like best about Jumplead?
Probably the best value in marketing automation. Support is decent. It is very easy to use compared to other marketing automation tools.

If you're just starting out in marketing automation and want something simple, this is a great choice. Pretty much anyone can use Jumplead - we were able to onboard new users into Jumplead in less than an hour.

You really get a lot for the money. The deliverability of emails was good - another important factor when considering a marketing automation platform.

What do you dislike about Jumplead?
New features are slow to roll out.

The autoresponders and broadcasts are pretty basic in functionality.

Recommendations to others considering Jumplead:
Be aware of the limitations and don't expect to implement complex logic using this tool.

review_question_answers.question: Describe the project or task Jumplead helped with:
review_question_answers.answer: Implementing low-cost marketing automation

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Jumplead?
review_question_answers.answer:
Probably the best value in marketing automation. Support is decent. It is very easy to use compared to other marketing automation tools.

If you're just starting out in marketing automation and want something simple, this is a great choice. Pretty much anyone can use Jumplead - we were able to onboard new users into Jumplead in less than an hour.

You really get a lot for the money. The deliverability of emails was good - another important factor when considering a marketing automation platform.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Jumplead?
review_question_answers.answer:
New features are slow to roll out.

The autoresponders and broadcasts are pretty basic in functionality.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Jumplead:
review_question_answers.answer: Be aware of the limitations and don't expect to implement complex logic using this tool.

What do you like best about Jumplead?
It's very useful to generate leads and saves a lot of agent time while it deals with clients at beginning levels. Client management is an outstanding pursuit of the application

What do you dislike about Jumplead?
Data management of clients , automatic tracking of website visits, and bulk marketing tool with AI to reach relevant chunk of the customers

Recommendations to others considering Jumplead:
Yes it's a very decent tool to use for marketing automation

What problems is Jumplead solving and how is that benefiting you?
Generation of leads, automatic responses to email campaign customers, and user-friendly interphase make life easier. Live chat option automation is a plus as well

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Jumplead?
i like that i easily combine marketing landing pages, integrated forms, lead management with scoring, and activity alerts, i combine forms with lead pages, i automate email marketing and live chat with my team, Jumplead imposes marketing and sales for my company


What do you dislike about Jumplead?
Is a good platform for small and medium enterprises that want to make their sales, advertising and marketing profitable, with an easy to use interface.

Recommendations to others considering Jumplead:
I recommend Jumplead as it manages, segments and scores your contacts, automatically tracks activities such as web visits, chat sessions, email interaction and form completion, Combining website analysis, email marketing and a contact management system, Jumplead identifies, converts and manages your potential customers.

What problems is Jumplead solving and how is that benefiting you?
I customized marketing campaigns with this platform for my company, I sent specific campaigns to my personalized contact segments and moved potential customers through my sales funnel, I made automatic response campaigns of multiple steps over time to nourish and re-involve my potential customers, Activate my campaigns with automation to respond to the behavior of my contact, such as completing a conversion form or visiting a certain website.

all_reviews.review_title: A great tool to monitor which corporates are interested in you
all_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Jumplead helped with:
I used Jumplead for website traffic tracking & some marketing automation when I worked at Epiphan Video, so when we website conversion challenges at Bunch I decided to try Jumplead for the same purpose.

What do you like best about Jumplead?
Jumplead is great in showing you which corporate customers visited your website, it would sometimes show exact people who rolled around the website and would connect this with Google Analytics data to show which pages they visited and how long they stayed for, where they converted (if converted) etc. This gives one a card blanche to go after these folks - I would connect with them on LinkedIn, reach out with the message and close them for a call. Having insights on the pages they visited I'd be able to say what they are majorly interested in - which of the problems Bunch solves are the most acute ones (e.g. measuring culture/hiring/improving teamwork).

What do you dislike about Jumplead?
There are several things that Jumplead doesn't seem to work well for:

- Monitoring traffic from SMEs and startups - it can only show who visited for bigger corporates, but it can't do so for smaller companies and startups (key audience for Bunch)
- Jumplead has some of Intercom's features - e.g. website chat and follow-up functionality, however they are not as robust and as well-designed as Intercom's (that's why we use Intercom for this stuff)

Recommendations to others considering Jumplead:
If you are working with corporates and want to get a better use of your website traffic, better capture leads and supply your sales guys with some more warm leads - Jumplead will be of great help. It would also work well if you are looking for a relatively low-cost marketing automation solution. If you want a high-end setup with better design, more functionality etc. - then you are better off combining other tools. I wouldn't say Jumplead works well for companies targeting SMEs - a lot of value is lost as it just doesn't recognize those leads.

all_reviews.review_title: Great value for a basic marketing automation platform
all_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Jumplead helped with:
Implementing low-cost marketing automation

What do you like best about Jumplead?
Probably the best value in marketing automation. Support is decent. It is very easy to use compared to other marketing automation tools.

If you're just starting out in marketing automation and want something simple, this is a great choice. Pretty much anyone can use Jumplead - we were able to onboard new users into Jumplead in less than an hour.

You really get a lot for the money. The deliverability of emails was good - another important factor when considering a marketing automation platform.

What do you dislike about Jumplead?
New features are slow to roll out.

The autoresponders and broadcasts are pretty basic in functionality.

Recommendations to others considering Jumplead:
Be aware of the limitations and don't expect to implement complex logic using this tool.
